basic.Peptide Name: Lingual antimicrobial peptide (LAP, beta defensin, cattle, ruminant, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.7886453] Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus 29213 (MIC=63-125 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D31 (MIC=16-32 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa 27853  (MIC=63-125 μg/ml);Fungi:Candida albicans 14053  (MIC=32-63 μg/ml), Candida tropicalis 13803 (MIC=16-32 μg/ml).
